data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Millwall get the game underway.
The first-half is in progress. Millwall get the game underway.
Goal! Millwall take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Matt Smith.
Millwall take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Jayson Molumby.
Great finish from Matt Smith to give Millwall a 0-3 lead.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Nottingham kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
The home team replace Alfa Semedo with John Bostock.
Gary Rowett is making the team's first substitution at City Ground with Tom Bradshaw replacing Mason Bennett.
Tyler Walker is on a sub for Joao Carvalho for Nottingham.
Millwall make their second substitution with Alex Pearce replacing Matt Smith.
Brice Samba is booked for the home team.
Adama Diakhaby is replacing Joe Lolley for Nottingham at City Ground.
The away team have replaced Shane Ferguson with Jon Dadi BÃ¶dvarsson. This is the third substitution made today by Gary Rowett.
Jake Cooper (Millwall) has received a yellow card from Geoff Eltringham.
That's full-time at City Ground. The final score is 0-3.
